meanings.definition: An affix added to the end of a word to form a new word.
meanings.sent1: I learned about suffixes in school.
meanings.sent2: She added different suffixes to the base words.
meanings.sent3: The suffixes had a party at the end of the word.
meanings.sent4: The suffixes were like tiny decorations for the words.
meanings.sent5: Suffixes are like little hats for words.

meanings.definition: A letter or group of letters added to the end of a word to change its meaning or function.
meanings.sent1: The English language has many suffixes.
meanings.sent2: Students were studying the meanings of various suffixes.
meanings.sent3: The suffixes were playing hide and seek with the words.
meanings.sent4: The suffixes acted like secret agents changing the words.
meanings.sent5: Suffixes are the detectives of word meanings.
